randomizer fabric.name: randomizer fabric
randomizer fabric.summary: A Randomizer wrapped as a peripheral allows for, basic interaction with adjacent randomizers.

randomizer fabric.getRandom.name: randomizer fabric.getRandom()
randomizer fabric.getRandom.summary: Returns a random number that is also the redstone output of the Randomizer Block

randomizer fabric.toggle.name: randomizer fabric.toggle(state)
randomizer fabric.toggle.summary: Sets the enabled state on the Randomizer Block

randomizer forge.name: randomizer forge
randomizer forge.summary: A Randomizer wrapped as a peripheral allows for, basic interaction with adjacent randomizers.

randomizer forge.getRandom.name: randomizer forge.getRandom()
randomizer forge.getRandom.summary: Returns a random number that is also the redstone output of the Randomizer Block

randomizer forge.toggle.name: randomizer forge.toggle(state)
randomizer forge.toggle.summary: Sets the enabled state on the Randomizer Block
